item.title: The Summary of Learning to Search for Dependencies
item.description: Table of Contents 1. Introduction 2. Learning to search 3. Dependency Parsing by Learning to Search 4. Experimental Results 5. Related Works Reference 1. Introduction Transition-based dependency parsers are a type of popular tool for solving structured prediction problems or joint prediction problems. There are many constructions for transition-based dependency parsers such as transition systems, feature engineering, neural-network predictors and the importance of training against a â€œdynamic oracle.
